name: Asteroidz (MetzgerMade)
description:
Remake of my old Asteroidz game, that was one of the first games I ever finished long time ago. 

Asteroidz is and Asteroids clone. Space action shooter where your goal is to get as far as you can trough as many sectors as you can and earn highscore.

Features: 

  • Infinite levels
  • Increasing difficulty
  • Versus multiplayer
  • Powerups
  • Enemies
